```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(eval = TRUE, 
                      echo = TRUE, 
                      cache = TRUE,
                      include = TRUE,
                      collapse = FALSE,
                      dependson = NULL,
                      engine = "R", # Chunks will always have R code, unless noted
                      error = TRUE,
                      fig.path="Figures/cached/",  # Set the figure options
                      fig.align = "center"
)
```
